ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Slice off the top of the garlic bulb to expose cloves before cooking
Drizzle with olive oil and salt for better flavor development
Squeeze roasted garlic directly onto bread or into soups after cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What makes roasted garlic so versatile, and how does the Instant Pot streamline this normally slow process?
